name: Flares
display_help: You have been set on fire by the Flares attack.

name: Fire_Ball
display_help: You have been set on fire by the Fireball.

name: Ring_of_Fire
display_help: You have been Immobilized by a Ring of Fire. It is burning you for Minor fire Damage Over Time.

name: Char
display_help: You have been Incapacitated by the soot and cinders from the Char spell.

name: Adv_Assault_Rifle
display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Greater_Rikti_Sword
display_help: You are Disoriented.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: The Mental Blast has slowed your reflexes. Your attack speed is reduced.

name: Mesmerize
display_help: You have been put to Sleep. You are helpless until the effect is broken.

name: Dominate
display_help: Your mind has been Dominated. You are Held.

name: Resistance
display_help: Rikti Mentalist armor makes them are resistant to Lethal, Smashing, and Energy damage. Their enhanced mental powers also make them resistant to Sleep, Confuse, Fear and Psionic damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Smash, Lethal, Energy, Psionic

name: Mind_Stab
display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Subdue
display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Psychic_Scream
display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Mesmerize
display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Confuse
display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate

name: Fly
display_help: Cabal Mavens can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Flurry
display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of punches to pummel your foe. Flurry is so dizzying that it has a chance to Disorient the target.

name: Boxing
display_help: A decent punch that has a small chance to Disorient foes.

name: Kick
display_help: A modest kicking attack that has a small chance to knock opponents down.

name: Whirlwind
display_help: You spin around at an amazing speed to create a Whirlwind around yourself. Any foes that enter this Whirlwind will be tossed into the air. You must be at least level 20 and have two other Speed Powers before selecting Whirlwind.

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Speed_Boost
display_help: You can hasten a single targeted ally. The target's movement speed, attack rate, and Endurance recovery are all greatly increased and the target gains resistance to Slow effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast

name: Fulcrum_Shift
display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Energy Torrent unleashes a cone of powerful energy that can smash foes and possibly send them flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Target_Pistol
display_help: This invention can cause a target to feel tired and worn down, reducing the speed of their attacks. The Lethargy Inducer has 20 charges.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Quick Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Tranq_Dart
display_help: This invention can cause a target to feel tired and worn down, reducing the speed of their attacks. The Lethargy Inducer has 20 charges.

name: Mass_Hypnosis
display_help: Hypnotizes a group of foes at a distance and puts them to Sleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. This power deals no damage, but if done discreetly, the targets will never be aware of your presence. Recharge: Slow

name: Dominate
display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dark_Embrace
display_help: You tap into the energy of the Netherworld to protect yourself from damage. This Dark Embrace shrouds you and grants resistance to Lethal, Smashing, Negative Energy and Toxic damage. Recharge: Fast

name: Death_Shroud
display_help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast

name: Murky_Cloud
display_help: You create a Murky Cloud enshrouding you. This cloud can absorb all forms of energy, making you more resistant to Fire, Cold, Energy, and Negative Energy attacks, as well as Endurance Drain effects. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative, End Drain)

name: Obsidian_Shield
display_help: You can create a special Obsidian Shield that grants good resistance to Psionic damage. With your mind enshrouded in darkness you are protected from Sleep, Fear, Hold and Disorient attacks. Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Psionic, Sleep, Hold, Disorient, Fear)

name: Dark_Regeneration
display_help: You can tap the dark essence of the Netherworld to drain a small amount of life from all enemies nearby, thus healing yourself. The more foes affected, the more you will be healed. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Cloak_of_Darkness
display_help: A shroud of Netherworld darkness envelops you, making you difficult to spot at a distance. You can be seen only at close range, or if you attack a target. Even if seen, the Cloak of Darkness grants you a bonus to Defense to all attacks attacks and some protection from Immobilization. This Netherworld Cloak also allows you to see things in a new light, allowing you to better see stealthy foes. Unlike some stealth powers, Cloak of Darkness has no movement penalty. Cloak of Darkness will not work with any other form of Concealment power such as Shadow Fall or Steamy Mist. Recharge: Slow

name: Cloak_of_Fear
display_help: You can wrap yourself in a nightmarish Cloak of Fear. Foes close to you are treated to visions most horrific, forcing them to tremble in terror, only attacking if attacked, and even then, at reduced Accuracy. Recharge: Fast

name: Oppressive_Gloom
display_help: The Netherworld has many mutable properties, such as the Oppressive Gloom. This power allows you to use your own Hit Points to keep enemies near you Disoriented and unable to use any powers. Endurance cost for this is minimal, but the power can be dangerous to use. Recharge: Moderate

name: Soul_Transfer
display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can perform a Soul Transfer, sucking the life force of all foes around you to bring yourself back from the brink of death. The more foes nearby, the more life is restored to you. Drained foes are left Disoriented. The dark effects of this Soul Transfer will actually leave you invulnerable for a brief time, and protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. There must be at least one foe nearby to fuel the Transfer and revive yourself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Very Long

name: Thunder_Kick
display_help: You can perform a strong Thunder Kick that hits so hard it can Disorient your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: You can unleash a roundhouse kick that pummels your foe for moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Medium

name: Cobra_Strike
display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Focus_Chi
display_help: Tapping into your inner Chi greatly increases the amount of damage you deal for a few seconds, as well as slightly increasing your Accuracy. Recharge: Long

name: Crane_Kick
display_help: You can perform a slow, high damage kick that will likely knock your target back. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Crippling_Axe_Kick
display_help: You can perform a Crippling Axe Kick that deals minor smashing damage, but has a chance to Immobilize your target, as well as Slowing their run speed. Crippling Axe Kick may also knock some flying entities out of the sky. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Dragons_Tail
display_help: This low spinning kick deals the same damage as Thunder Kick, but has a chance to hit all enemies in melee range. Successful hits will trip and knock down your opponents. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: PBAoE Melee, Moderate DMG(Smash), Foe Knockback

name: Eagles_Claw
display_help: You can perform a devastating kick that can severely Disorient most opponents. Eagle's Claw has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Martial Arts attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG(Smash), Foe Minor Disorient, +Special

name: Torrent
display_help: You summon a wave of mire that sweeps away foes within its arc. The attack deals minimal Negative Energy damage, but sends foes flying and reduces their Accuracy. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Petrifying_Gaze
display_help: Petrifies a single targeted foe with a terrifying gaze. The victim is Held and defenseless. Recharge: Slow

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: A long range blast of dark energy. Deals moderate Negative Energy damage and reduces the target's Accuracy. You must be level 44 and have Torrent or Petrifying Gaze before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: You can create a cone shaped rift to the Netherworld that allows its native creatures to slip their oily Tentacles into our reality. These creatures will snare all foes within range, Immobilizing them while the Tentacles drain their life and reduce their Accuracy. You must be level 47 and have two other Darkness Mastery Powers before selecting this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Ravenstorm can inherently jump real high and travel very fast.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Heavy_Sonic_Blast
display_help: The Heavy Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.

name: Sonic_Blast
display_help: The Blast from the Sonic Cannon has reduced you Resistance to all damage types except Psionics.

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Cabal Mavens can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Jab
display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Jab.

name: Punch
display_help: Your Super Strength Punch can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off his feet, unable to attack again until he stands up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Haymaker
display_help: A slow but devastating attack, the Haymaker has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Hand_Clap
display_help: Statesman has Disoriented you with his Hand Clap.

name: Knockout_Blow
display_help: Statesman has hit you with a Knockout Blow. You are Held.

name: Hurl
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is close ranged, deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Foot_Stomp
display_help: Using your superior leg strength, you can Stomp your foot to the ground, quaking the earth itself. This is a localized attack against everything in melee range. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Thunderous_Blast
display_help: Statesman's Thunderous Blast has temporarily halted your Endurance Recovery.

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage. Recharge: Fast

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: You can activate this power to increase your maximum Hit Points for a short time. Recharge: Very Long

name: Unyielding
display_help: When you toggle on this power, you become Unyielding. You are resistant to Knockback, Sleep, Hold, Disorient effects, and all damage except Psionics, although your defiant stature means you are more likely to be hit. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: Self +Res(Knockback, Sleep, Disorient, Hold, All DMG but Psionics), Self -DEF

name: Invincibility
display_help: While this power is active, for each foe in melee range you receive a bonus to Defense against all melee attacks, some Defense to Ranged attacks, and a bonus to your Accuracy. This power is most effective while fighting multiple opponents. Invincibility is ineffective if you are battling foes at a range. Recharge: Slow

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears off you are left exhausted, and drained of almost all Health and Endurance. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Cybernetic_Blade
display_help: A Cybernetic Blade is a powerful lethal attack

name: Blast
display_help: The Zenith Mech's Blast sends a focused beam of energy that can knock foes back.

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: Resistance

name: Adv_Assault_Rifle
display_help: Fires a large slug at a single target at very long range. This very accurate weapon hits hard, and can knock down foes.

name: Brawl
display_help: When all else fails, you have only your two fists to depend on.

name: Mental_Blast
display_help: This basic attack does moderate Psionic damage, and can slightly reduce a target's attack speed. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Subdue
display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Psychic_Scream
display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Mesmerize
display_help: Mesmerize painfully assails a target with psychic energy, rendering him unconscious. The target will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Dominate
display_help: Painfully tears at the mind of a single foe. Dominate deals Psionic damage and renders a foe helpless, lost in his own mind and unable to defend himself. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Confuse
display_help: You can Confuse an enemy, forcing him to believe his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Confuse someone before he has noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Confused enemy. Recharge: Moderate

name: Fly
display_help: Cabal Mavens can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Gale
display_help: You can call forth a tremendous gust of Gale force winds that knock down foes and deal some Smashing damage in a wide cone area. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: O2_Boost
display_help: Saturates the air around a targeted ally with rich oxygen, healing his wounds. The O2 Boost can protect a targeted ally from Sleep, Stun and Endurance Drain effects. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Fast

name: Snow_Storm
display_help: While active, the chill from this Snow Storm can dramatically Slow the attack and movement speed of the target and all nearby foes. Recharge: Slow

name: Charged_Bolts
display_help: You can quickly hurl small bolts of electricity at foes, dealing some damage and draining some Endurance. Charged Bolts deals light damage but recharges quickly. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage and draining some Endurance. Lightning Bolt deals more damage than Charged Bolts, but recharges more slowly. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Ball_Lightning
display_help: Hurls a highly charged ball of lightning that explodes on contact. Ball Lightning deals good damage in an area of effect, and drains some Endurance from each target it hits. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Short_Circuit
display_help: Releases a burst of electrical energy around you, shocking all nearby foes. This highly accurate discharge deals Moderate damage over time, drains a lot of Endurance from the targets and renders them unable to recover Endurance for quite a while. Additionally, Short Circuit deals extra damage to most robots and mechanical foes. Short Circuit is very effective when used with your other Endurance draining powers. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Ice_Bolt
display_help: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Ice_Blast
display_help: Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Frost_Breath
display_help: Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Aim
display_help: Greatly increases the Accuracy of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

name: Freeze_Ray
display_help: Although this power deals very little damage, the Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding him helpless in place for a while. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Ice_Storm
display_help: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long
display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD

name: Bitter_Ice_Blast
display_help: A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's Accuracy. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Bitter_Freeze_Ray
display_help: This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed. Bitter Freeze Ray deals medium damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Blizzard
display_help: The massive damage from the Blizzard can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their Accuracy and possibly knocking them back. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -ACC, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback, Self -Recovery

name: Ring_of_Fire
display_help: Immobilizes your target in a Ring of Fire. Deals some damage over time. Useful for keeping villains at bay. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Medium

name: Fire_Sword
display_help: Through concentration, you can create a sword of fire that can set foes ablaze. Successful attacks from the Fire Sword will ignite your target, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Combustion
display_help: Your mastery of fire allows you to violently raise the temperature around yourself in an attempt to spontaneously combust any nearby foes and set them ablaze, dealing damage over time. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Fire_Sword_Circle
display_help: Mastery of your Fire Sword has enabled you to make an attack on every foe within melee distance. This will slash and burn your enemies, dealing minor damage and setting them ablaze. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Build_Up
display_help: Greatly boosts your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases Accuracy. Recharge: Long

name: Consume
display_help: You can Consume some fuel from your nearby enemies to recover Endurance. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Long

name: Burn
display_help: You can ignite the ground beneath you, freeing yourself from Immobilization effects. Foes that enter the flames you leave behind will take damage. You must be near the ground to activate this power. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Fly
display_help: Cabal Mavens can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Ethereal
display_help: You can Phase Shift to become out of sync with normal space. Although you do not become completely Invisible, you are translucent and hard to see. You are intangible, and cannot be affected by those in normal space.

name: Snap_Shot
display_help: A quick attack that fires an arrow at your foe after only minimal aiming. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

name: Aimed_Shot
display_help: Though it takes longer to execute, your Aimed Shot deals greater damage than the Quick Shot. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Stunning_Shot
display_help: You fire a blunt, weighted arrow at your target's chest. The Stunning Shot has a good chance of stunning your foe. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Blazing_Arrow
display_help: You fire a Blazing Arrow at your foe, dealing some Lethal damage and causing him to catch on fire and burn. Slightly less accurate than other Archery attacks. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Twilight_Grasp
display_help: You channel Negative Energy from the Netherworld through yourself to a targeted foe. Twilight Grasp drains the power from that target and slowly transfers it to you and all nearby allies. The targeted foe's Accuracy and damage are reduced, while you and your nearby allies are healed. Recharge: Moderate

name: Darkest_Night
display_help: While active, you channel Negative Energy onto a targeted foe. Darkest Night decreases the damage potential and Accuracy of the target, and all foes nearby, as long as you keep the power active. Recharge: Slow

name: Shadow_Fall
display_help: Envelops you and your nearby teammates in a shroud of darkness. Shadow Fall does not grant Invisibility, but it does make you harder to detect. Even if you are discovered, Shadow Fall grants a bonus to Defense and Resistance to Fear, while reducing Energy, Negative Energy, and Psionic Damage. Shadow Fall reduces your movement speed, but not your allies'. Recharge: Slow
display_short_help: Toggle: PBAoE, Team Stealth, +DEF, +Res(Energy, Negative, Psionics, Fear)

name: Fearsome_Stare
display_help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow

name: Lift
display_help: Negates the gravity around a single target. Lift violently sends an enemy straight into the air, then slams him to the ground for Smashing damage. This power can bring flying foes to the ground. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Gravity_Distortion
display_help: Causes a single foe to be trapped in a misshapen gravity field, rendering him unable to take action. Gravity Distortion deals Smashing damage to the target. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Propel
display_help: You can open a gravitational rift and retrieve a heavy object, then Propel it at your foes for Smashing Damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
